div.div: Conceptual diagram of the influence of SLR on wave heights, wave-driven runup, and flooding and the resulting impact on atoll island groundwater.
div.p: ( A) Current sea level. ( B) Future elevated sea level. SLR will allow for greater wave heights, H, and wave-driven runup, R, than at present, resulting in frequent overwash that will contaminate the atoll islandâ€™s freshwater lens. High vertical exaggeration in schematic.
